content: Are any app developers interested in some shared testing with a CARIN BlueButton server? May be an opportunity for some synergy here.

We (CareEvolution) are
Are you at the CMS c'thon?
We'd definitely be interested in testing the open source, Sync for Science Procure app against a Carin BB server. I'm at the CMS Connectathon today and tomorrow morning as well if you're here.
Hi @Michele Mottini and @Dan Gottlieb what track are you attending in CMS c'thon?
Let's have a conversation, i am interested in connecting our app for testing
@Elkhan Yusubov I'm over at the bulk data table
I am at the US core table
Hi @Michele Mottini - hope to catch up with you tomorrow, have to head out.
I am not at the Connectathon, but we are "close" to having patient, coverage, and EOB endpoints that can be tested. I am very curious how apps will be displaying this data.
@josh lamb drop a note with details, when you have it ready for testing.
Are there more sandboxes in addition to the ones listed during the connectathon? Will there be a place that a list of test payer FHIR servers is maintained? Thanks!
